member.param: The unit standing on the block.
The time or delta time parameter.

member.name: M:Block.StepOn(TestVanDammeAnim)
member.summary: Called when a unit steps on this block. Triggers visual effects on the block by calling SteppedOnEffects with no specific direction and zero spread.
member.param: The unit that stepped on the block.

member.name: M:Block.StepOn(Grenade)
member.summary: Called when a grenade lands on this block. Triggers visual effects on the block by calling SteppedOnEffects with no specific direction and zero spread.
member.param: The grenade that landed on the block.

member.name: M:Block.StepOnBlock
member.summary: Generic method called when anything steps on this block. Triggers visual effects by calling SteppedOnEffects with no specific direction and zero spread.

member.name: M:Block.StepOnBlockForced
member.summary: Network-synchronized version of StepOnBlock that can be called via RPC. Marked with [AllowedRPC] attribute. Triggers visual effects by calling SteppedOnEffects with no specific direction and zero spread.

member.name: M:Block.StepOnBlockImmediate
member.summary: Immediately triggers step-on effects without any delay. Calls SteppedOnEffects with no specific direction and zero spread. Used when instant visual feedback is needed.

member.name: M:Block.SteppedOnEffects(DirectionEnum,System.Int32)
member.summary: Applies visual bump effects to all block pieces when something steps on the block. Iterates through all addedObjects (decorative pieces) and the topEdge piece, calling their Bump method to create movement/shake effects.
member.param: The direction of the impact that caused the step.
How many blocks the effect has spread across (used for diminishing effects).

member.name: P:Block.IsParachuteActive
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this block has an active parachute attachment. Virtual property that can be overridden by derived block types to implement parachute functionality for slowly falling blocks.

member.name: F:Block.immuneToSlime
member.summary: Determines whether this block is immune to slime coverage effects. When true, slime cannot attach to or spread onto this block.

member.name: F:Block.isOily
member.summary: Indicates whether this block is covered in oil. Oily blocks can catch fire and spread flames. Affects fire propagation behavior.

member.name: F:Block.jiggleDoodads
member.summary: List of jiggle doodads attached to this block. These doodads will jiggle when the block is disturbed. Cleared in OnSpawned and managed through attachment methods.

member.name: F:Block.oilPoolPlaced
member.summary: Reference to oil pool doodad placed below this block when hit by oil. Set in Bloody() when oil counter exceeds threshold.

member.name: F:Block.slimeCover
member.summary: List of slime ground cover objects attached to this block. Represents alien slime or other ground cover effects. Cleared in OnSpawned and managed dynamically.

member.name: F:Block.stuckParticles
member.summary: List of oil particles stuck to this block. These particles can be ignited when the block burns. Cleared in OnSpawned and managed as oil is applied to the block.

member.name: M:Block.Disturb
member.summary: Handles disturbance of the block when called via RPC. Simply calls the base class Disturb implementation to trigger any physics or visual reactions.

member.name: M:Block.Disturb
member.summary: Handles the disturbance of this block, typically from explosions or other environmental effects. Marked with [AllowedRPC] attribute for network synchronization. Calls the base class Disturb implementation.

member.name: M:Block.DisturbNetworked
member.summary: Sends an RPC call to all players to disturb this block. Calls the Disturb method on all connected clients for synchronized physics reactions.

member.name: M:Block.DisturbNetworked
member.summary: Sends a network RPC call to disturb this block on all connected clients. Uses Networking.RPC to call the Disturb method across the network with PID.TargetAll.

member.name: M:Block.PackState(UnityStream)
member.summary: Packs the block's state data for network synchronization. For FallingBlock instances that have moved from their initial position, serializes the current column, row, and rotation values. Called during network state transmission to sync block positions across clients.
member.param: The network stream to serialize the block state data into
member.returns: The stream with the serialized state data, after calling base.PackState

member.name: M:Block.RegisterBlockOnNetwork
member.summary: Registers this block and all its child components with the networking system for multiplayer synchronization. Allocates deterministic IDs for the block transform, gameObject, replacement NID, all child BroforceObjects, and all child colliders (including their transforms).

member.name: M:Block.UnpackState(UnityStream)
member.summary: Unpacks network state data to restore the block's synchronized position and rotation. Deserializes column, row, and rotation values from the stream and applies them to this FallingBlock instance. Used to apply state received from other clients.
member.param: The network stream containing the serialized block state data
member.returns: The stream after deserialization, from base.UnpackState

member.name: F:Block.replacementNID
member.summary: Network ID allocated for the replacement block that will be created when this block is replaced during collapse. Pre-allocated deterministically to ensure consistent network object creation across all clients.

member.name: M:Block.OnDisable
member.summary: Unity callback when the block GameObject is disabled. Currently empty but provides a hook for cleanup operations.

member.name: M:Block.Rotate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the block by the specified direction. Currently empty implementation that can be overridden by derived block types that support rotation.
member.param: The direction to rotate (specific values depend on implementation).

member.name: M:Block.Destroy
member.summary: Empty private method that serves as a placeholder. The actual destruction logic is handled elsewhere in the Block class. This method exists but has no implementation.

member.name: M:Block.PsuedoRandomNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-random integer between 0 and max (inclusive) based on the block's grid position and game seed. Uses a deterministic formula to ensure consistent random numbers across game sessions with the same seed.
member.param: The maximum value for the random number (inclusive)
member.returns: A pseudo-random integer between 0 and max

member.name: M:Block.PsuedoRandomValue(System.Single)
member.summary: Generates a pseudo-random value between 0 and 1 based on the block's grid position and game seed. Uses column * row * (seed + 1) to create deterministic random values that are consistent across game sessions with the same seed.
member.param: The range modulator for the random value generation
member.returns: A pseudo-random float value between 0 and 1

member.name: F:Block.burnRandom
member.summary: Random number generator used for burn effects and flame particle positioning. Initialized in SetupRandomGenerators with a deterministic seed based on position. Used to create random burn counter delays and flame effect directions.

member.name: F:Block.collapseBelow
member.summary: Unused flag intended to track whether blocks below should collapse. Not implemented in current code.

member.name: F:Block.collapseRandom
member.summary: Random number generator used for collapse chance calculations. Initialized in SetupRandomGenerators with a deterministic seed. Compared against collapseChance to determine if blocks above should collapse when this block is destroyed.

member.name: F:Block.effectsRandom
member.summary: Random number generator reserved for visual effects. Initialized in SetupRandomGenerators with a deterministic seed based on position. Currently initialized but not actively used in the base Block class.

member.name: F:Block.groundHit
member.summary: Raycast hit result used for detecting neighboring blocks. Used in ShowAboveBlockBottomEdge() and CrumbleBridges() for physics queries.

member.name: F:Block.named
member.summary: Tracks whether the block's GameObject name has been set with grid coordinates. Prevents duplicate naming in Setup() method.

member.name: F:Block.pushForce
member.summary: Accumulated horizontal push force applied to the block. Modified by Push() method and processed in RunPushLogic().

member.name: F:Block.random
member.summary: Random number generator for general block randomization. Initialized with a seed based on the block's position plus the networking random seed to ensure deterministic behavior across clients. Used for various random effects and calculations.

member.name: F:Block.sound
member.summary: Cached reference to Sound singleton instance. Initialized in Start() and used in PlayDeathSound() for audio playback.

member.name: F:Block.soundVolume
member.summary: Volume multiplier for block destruction sounds. Used in PlayDeathSound() with different multipliers based on damage type (0.15x for Unholy, 0.6x for InstaGib).

member.name: F:Block.t
member.summary: Delta time value clamped between 0 and 0.033334 seconds (approximately 30 FPS frame time). Updated each frame in Update method and used for time-based calculations to ensure consistent behavior regardless of actual framerate.

member.name: M:BroBase.Awake
member.summary: Initializes the BroBase instance, marking it as a hero character and adding it to the static bros list. Sets up essential hero-specific functionality before other components initialize.

member.name: M:BroBase.OnDestroy
member.summary: Cleans up the BroBase instance by removing it from the static bros list before destruction. Ensures proper cleanup of static references to prevent memory leaks.

member.name: M:BroBase.Start
member.summary: Completes BroBase initialization after all objects are created. Sets up network syncing and jetpack state.

member.name: M:BroBase.Update
member.summary: Processes BroBase-specific updates each frame including flex invulnerability, network synchronization, performance enhancement effects, cardio/dashing mechanics, jetpack functionality, and holy water revival timing. Extends base update functionality with hero-specific behaviors.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateCustomMelee
member.summary: Handles animation for custom melee types. Default implementation delegates to knife melee animation, serving as override point for unique attack animations in derived bros.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateKnifeMelee
member.summary: Animates knife attacks with context-specific sprite sequences. Uses row 1 (frames 25-31) for standing attacks and row 6 (frames 17-23) for jumping/dashing variants. Triggers attack on frame 3 with extended timing for dashing strikes.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateMelee
member.summary: Routes melee animation to type-specific methods. Directs knife attacks to knife animation, punches to punch animation, and all other types to custom melee animation. Central routing point for the 15 different melee attack types.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateMeleeCommon
member.summary: Provides shared animation logic for melee attacks. Handles sprite resets, frame timing (40 FPS), melee follow-up loops, and high-five interrupts for throwing nearby mooks during melee combos.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimatePunch
member.summary: Animates punch attacks using sprite frames 25-33. Triggers punch attacks on frame 3, with extended attack window for jetpack punches (frames 4-5). Includes impact emphasis delays and combo loop support.

member.name: M:BroBase.CanStartMeleeFollowUp
member.summary: Determines if a follow-up melee attack can begin during current animation. Returns true after frame 7, enabling combo chains and continuous melee sequences.
member.returns: True if current animation frame is greater than 7; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.CanStartNewMelee
member.summary: Checks if a new melee attack can interrupt the current action. Allows new attacks when not meleeing or after frame 3 of current melee, enabling responsive combat and combo potential.
member.returns: True if not meleeing or frame is greater than 3; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.CanStartNewPunch
member.summary: Validates timing for new punch attacks with slightly stricter requirements than general melee. Allows punches when not meleeing or after frame 4, providing balanced combo timing.
member.returns: True if not meleeing or frame is greater than 4; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.CancelMelee
member.summary: Cancels ongoing melee attacks and resets related state. Clears the chosen melee target, restores normal fall speed, and resets direction change cancellation flag. Ensures clean exit from melee state.

member.name: M:BroBase.KickDoors(System.Single)
member.summary: Kicks doors and destructible objects within specified range. Performs raycast detection, excludes parachutes, sends open command with direction, and applies 500 horizontal crush force to break barriers.
member.param: Maximum distance to check for kickable objects.

member.name: M:BroBase.PerformKnifeMeleeAttack(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes knife slash attacks with 14x24 unit hit box. Deals knife damage type, kicks doors within 24 units, applies 200 horizontal and 500 vertical knockback force. Creates appropriate hit effects and sounds.
member.param: Whether to attempt terrain damage if no unit is hit.
Whether to play miss sound if attack fails to connect.

member.name: M:BroBase.PerformOverriddenMelee
member.summary: Virtual hook for derived classes to implement custom melee attacks. Empty base implementation allows subclasses to define unique melee behaviors without modifying core melee system.

member.name: M:BroBase.PerformPunchAttack(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes punch attacks with standard or jetpack-enhanced variants. Standard punches deal 4 damage with 250 knockback force, while jetpack punches deal 10 damage with 600 knockback force. Creates visual effects, kicks doors, damages terrain, and adds upward momentum for jetpack variant.
member.param: Whether to attempt terrain damage if no unit is hit.
Whether to play miss sound if attack fails to connect.

member.name: M:BroBase.PerformSmashAttack
member.summary: Performs crushing smash attacks with 8 unit range. Deals 10 crush damage with minimal horizontal knockback (20 force) but moderate vertical force (50). Uses alternate sound effects to differentiate from standard attacks.

member.name: M:BroBase.ResetMeleeValues
member.summary: Resets melee state flags to prepare for new attacks. Clears miss sound, attack performed, and hit flags. Virtual method allowing subclasses to reset additional melee-related state.

member.name: M:BroBase.RunCustomMeleeMovement
member.summary: Controls movement during custom melee attacks. Default implementation uses knife melee movement pattern, providing override point for specialized movement behaviors.

member.name: M:BroBase.RunJetPackPunchMovement
member.summary: Manages special movement for jetpack-powered punches. Creates horizontal jetpack flames and applies 200 unit thrust force during frames 2-4, followed by rapid deceleration. Provides unique physics for aerial combat moves.

member.name: M:BroBase.RunMelee
member.summary: Manages movement during melee attacks based on type. Routes knife attacks to knife movement, punches to punch movement, jetpack punches to special jetpack movement, and others to custom movement handlers.

member.name: M:BroBase.RunPunchMovement
member.summary: Controls movement during punch attacks. Applies gravity for aerial punches, enables dash movement toward targets on frames 2-4 (up to 1.7x speed), and stops movement during recovery frames. Cancels if falling below ground.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartCustomMelee
member.summary: Initiates custom melee attacks with combo support. Validates attack timing, enables dashing melee mode when grounded, applies movement velocity, and handles melee follow-up chains. Entry point for non-standard melee types.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartKnifeMelee
member.summary: Initiates knife melee attacks with timing validation. Resets interaction timers, deactivates weapons, handles combo chains through melee follow-up system, and applies movement for dashing variants.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartMelee
member.summary: Initializes melee attacks with type-specific routing. Detects special conditions like standing on animals (forces knife melee) and routes to appropriate start methods: knife, punch, or custom melee based on the current melee type.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartMeleeCommon
member.summary: Common initialization for all melee attack types. Validates melee can start, resets state flags, deactivates weapons, records starting position, and triggers initial animation. Core setup for the melee system.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartPunch
member.summary: Initializes punch attacks with combo support. Validates punch can start, handles melee follow-up for combo chains, and delegates to common melee initialization. Entry point for standard and combo punches.

member.name: M:BroBase.TryMeleeTerrain(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to damage terrain or destructible objects with melee attacks. Performs raycast detection in melee range, deals configurable damage, and creates appropriate hit effects. Special handling for cage objects using full health as damage.
member.param: Horizontal offset for the terrain check.
Amount of damage to deal to terrain (default 2).
member.returns: True if terrain was hit and damaged; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:BroBase.currentMeleeType
member.summary: Active melee type being performed. Can differ from default when context changes (animal attacks force knife). Controls animation and damage calculations. Dynamic combat state.

member.name: F:BroBase.disembowelmentViscera
member.summary: Sprite template for gore effects during disembowel attacks. Instantiated and positioned at enemy location when disembowel melee succeeds. Creates visceral feedback for brutal melee finishers.

member.name: F:BroBase.hasJumpedForKick
member.summary: Tracks if automatic jump has occurred during kick animation. Prevents multiple jumps per kick. At frame 2, adds 150 upward velocity if false and grounded. Ensures consistent kick height.

member.name: F:BroBase.lerpToMeleeTargetPos
member.summary: Interpolation value for smooth melee movement toward target. Reset at melee start. Enables fluid combat positioning. Animation smoothing parameter.

member.name: F:BroBase.meleeStartPos
member.summary: Starting position vector when melee attack initiated. Captured in StartCustomMelee. Used for return positioning and movement calculations. Combat positioning anchor.

member.name: F:BroBase.meleeType
member.summary: Default melee attack type for this bro character. Source value for currentMeleeType. Defines base combat style (knife, punch, etc). Character-specific combat identifier.

member.name: F:BroBase.performedMeleeAttack
member.summary: Tracks if damage has been dealt in current melee attack. Reset in ResetMeleeValues. Prevents multiple damage applications per swing. Hit validation flag.

member.name: F:BroBase.splitkick
member.summary: Flag for split kick attack hitting both directions simultaneously. Set when horizontal velocity is low during kick initiation. Enables martial arts characters to hit enemies on both sides.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimatePockettedSpecial
member.summary: Animates pocketed special abilities with type-specific handling. Airstrike, MechDrop, and AlienPheromones use custom animation (row 5, frames 17-24) with ability trigger at frame 4. Other types use standard special animation.

member.name: M:BroBase.GetPockettedAmmoType
member.summary: Retrieves the current pocketed ammunition type to use. Returns the top item from the stack or None if inventory is empty, determining which special ability executes on use.
member.returns: The next pocketed ammo type to use, or None if empty.

member.name: M:BroBase.GetSprintValue
member.summary: Determines if the bro can currently sprint. Prevents sprinting while exhausted from overexertion, otherwise delegates to base sprint logic.
member.returns: False if exhausted; otherwise, returns base sprint value.

member.name: M:BroBase.MustUsePockettedSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Determines if pocketed ammunition must be used before default specials. Forces players to consume pickups before accessing their character's built-in abilities, ensuring pickup utility.
member.returns: True if any pocketed ammo exists; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.PickupPockettableAmmo(PockettedSpecialAmmoType)
member.summary: Adds pocketed special ammunition to inventory stack. Validates ammo type, appends to end of list for LIFO usage order, and updates HUD to display the newly acquired special ability.
member.param: The type of special ammunition being picked up.

member.name: M:BroBase.ReducePockettedSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Removes used pocketed ammunition from inventory stack. Removes from end of list maintaining LIFO order and updates HUD to reflect remaining ammunition or return to default special display.

member.name: M:BroBase.ReleaseRemoteControlCar
member.summary: Deploys remote-controlled vehicle from inventory. Simple wrapper that delegates to base implementation for RC car spawning and control transfer mechanics.

member.name: M:BroBase.SetPlayerHUDAmmo
member.summary: Updates HUD special ability display based on current inventory. Shows top pocketed ammo type with count of 1 if any exist, otherwise displays hero's default special ability with actual ammo count.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartPockettedSpecial
member.summary: Initiates use of pocketed special ammunition pickups. Validates bro state (not acid-covered or meleeing), sets the active special type, flags special use, and resets animation for special ability execution.

member.name: M:BroBase.ThrowAirstrikeGrenade
member.summary: Deploys airstrike grenade with stance-based trajectory. Crouching throws short (30 velocity, 70 angle) for close targets, standing throws long (200 velocity, 150 angle) for distant targets. Network-spawned projectile calls in aerial bombardment on impact.

member.name: M:BroBase.ThrowAlienPheromoneGrenade
member.summary: Deploys alien pheromone grenade for biological warfare. Uses standard stance-based throwing mechanics to deliver pheromones that affect alien behavior. Network-spawned projectile with tactical deployment options.

member.name: M:BroBase.ThrowMechDropGrenade
member.summary: Deploys mech drop grenade with identical mechanics to airstrike. Uses stance-based throwing system to mark landing zone for mech deployment. Network-synchronized projectile spawns combat mech on detonation.

member.name: M:BroBase.TimeSlowSpecialRPC
member.summary: Executes time-slowing special ability with mode-specific targeting. Plays bass drop sound, applies 1.2x general time boost, and adds color shift effect. In cooperative modes boosts all heroes by 1.5x, in competitive modes only boosts the casting player.

member.name: M:BroBase.UsePockettedSpecial
member.summary: Executes pocketed special abilities via type-specific RPC calls. Handles Airstrike, Timeslow, RemoteControlCar, MechDrop, AlienPheromones, and Steroids. Manages ammo consumption, HUD updates, and network synchronization for each ability type.

member.name: M:BroBase.UseSteroids
member.summary: Activates 10-second performance enhancement state. Sets enhanced flag, plays flex sound at 0.6 volume, triggers flex gesture animation, and initializes grunt counter based on player number for audio variety.

member.name: M:BroBase.UseSteroidsForDuration(System.Single)
member.summary: Activates performance enhancement for specified duration. Identical to standard steroids but with customizable timing, maintaining all visual and audio feedback effects.
member.param: Duration in seconds for the steroid effect.

member.name: M:BroBase.UseSteroidsNetworked
member.summary: Network wrapper for steroid activation across all players. Validates local ownership before broadcasting RPC to trigger steroid effects on all connected clients, ensuring synchronized performance enhancement.

member.name: M:BroBase.UseSteroidsNetworkedForDuration(System.Single)
member.summary: Network wrapper for variable-duration steroid activation. Broadcasts typed RPC with custom duration parameter to apply performance enhancement across all players with specified timing.
member.param: Duration in seconds for the steroid effect.

member.name: P:BroBase.SpecialAmmo
member.summary: Gets or sets the special ammo count with support for pocketed special ammo. When getting, returns 1 if the bro has pocketed special ammo stored, otherwise returns the actual special ammo count.
member.returns: 1 if has pocketed special ammo; otherwise, the base special ammo count.

member.name: F:BroBase.usingPockettedSpecialType
member.summary: Currently active pocketed special ammo type. Set during special ability use from inventory. Determines animation behavior for Airstrike, MechDrop, AlienPheromones. Default is Standard type.

member.name: F:BroBase.pockettedSpecialAmmo
member.summary: Stack of special ammunition types collected from crates but not yet used. Functions as LIFO (last-in-first-out) where newest ammo is used first. When non-empty, overrides standard special ammo and displays custom HUD icons. Consumed via ReducePockettedSpecialAmmo when special is triggered.

member.name: M:BroBase.AddSpeedLeft
member.summary: Applies leftward movement with performance boost. When enhanced and not in quicksand, increases left movement to 120% speed (maintains dash multiplier if dashing). Base movement applied first.

member.name: M:BroBase.AddSpeedRight
member.summary: Applies rightward movement with performance boost. When enhanced and not in quicksand, increases right movement to 120% speed (maintains dash multiplier if dashing). Mirrors left movement logic.

member.name: M:BroBase.AirJump
member.summary: Executes air jump with fart-based mechanics. Level 1 creates smoke and sound effects. Level 2 creates damaging explosion with huge fart sound. Jump force scales 0.5x-1.8x based on velocity, halves downward momentum before boost.

member.name: M:BroBase.CanUseJetpack
member.summary: Validates jetpack availability for use. Requires both local jetpack availability flag and player having Jetpack value in ValueOrchestrator system.
member.returns: True if jetpack is available and player has jetpack power-up; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.CreateBlastOffFlames(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates flame explosion effect at specified height. Spawns visual flame wall, damages units in 14x10 area with fire damage, applies 50 upward force. Only executes for local player ownership.
member.param: Vertical position for flame effect spawn.

member.name: M:BroBase.Fart(System.Int32)
member.summary: Virtual method for fart effects implementation. Empty base implementation provides hook for derived classes to implement custom fart behaviors based on fart level.
member.param: Intensity level of the fart effect.

member.name: M:BroBase.HitLeftWall
member.summary: Handles left wall collisions with melee cancellation. Extends base wall hit behavior by canceling ongoing melee attacks if a target has already been hit, preventing attacks from continuing through walls.

member.name: M:BroBase.HitRightWall
member.summary: Handles right wall collisions with melee cancellation. Extends base wall hit behavior by canceling ongoing melee attacks if a target has already been hit, preventing attacks from continuing through walls.

member.name: M:BroBase.Jump(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initiates jump with air ability resets. Enables flex air jumps and fart jumps based on available powers. Resets elbow slam and somersault states for clean jump execution.
member.param: Whether this is a wall jump.

member.name: M:BroBase.Land
member.summary: Handles landing mechanics with special elbow slam effects. Elbow slam creates shockwave explosion, damages units in 22x8 area and ground in 24 radius. Normal landing resets air abilities and jetpack availability.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartDashing
member.summary: Initiates dashing with special "fart dash" enhancement. When specific conditions are met, creates smoke effects, disturbs wildlife within 100 units, plays fart sound, and adds 50 horizontal and 60 vertical velocity boost.

member.name: M:BroBase.StopElbowSlamming
member.summary: Cancels elbow slam state and restores abilities. Resets slam flag and re-enables wall climbing capability. Simple state cleanup for movement system.

member.name: M:BroBase.UseJetpack
member.summary: Activates jetpack thrust with context-sensitive boost. Near ground (within 20 units) creates blast-off flames and strong upward boost (140+ velocity). In air provides moderate boost (60 velocity) with -50 floor. Manages jetpack state and audio.

member.name: P:BroBase.GetSpeed
member.summary: Gets movement speed with exhaustion penalty. Returns 75% speed when exhausted, normal speed when performance enhanced (negating exhaustion), or base speed otherwise.
member.returns: Current movement speed multiplier.

member.name: P:BroBase.jumpForce
member.summary: Gets or sets jump force with dynamic modifiers. Applies ValueOrchestrator modifications when player exists, adds 10% boost when performance enhanced. Setter stores base value for modification calculations.
member.returns: Modified jump force value based on power-ups and performance state.

member.name: F:BroBase.cardioTime
member.summary: Current sprint duration counter in seconds. Increments while dashing, decreases when not. Clamped 0-3 seconds. Triggers exhaustion when exceeding player's modified sprint time limit.

member.name: F:BroBase.fartJumpsLeftCount
member.summary: Counter for remaining flatulence-based air jumps. Reset to 1 when grounded or acquiring flatulence power. Decremented on use. Enables comedic double-jump mechanic with explosive effects.

member.name: F:BroBase.fartingCounter
member.summary: Timer for periodic fart explosions during flatulence. Resets every 0.07 seconds, triggering tiny explosions, ground damage, and velocity changes. Creates continuous area denial effect.

member.name: F:BroBase.fartingTime
member.summary: Active duration of flatulence explosion effect. Set to 0.3 for delayed fart, 0.36 for huge fart. While active, creates periodic explosions via fartingCounter. Comedy mechanic with gameplay impact.

member.name: F:BroBase.flexAirJumpsLeft
member.summary: Counter for remaining flex-powered air jumps. Set to 1 when landing or acquiring FlexAirJump perk. Consumed during air flex abilities. Enables acrobatic aerial maneuvers.

member.name: F:BroBase.frontSomersaulting
member.summary: Active state flag for front flip animation sequence. Set after air flex completion or specific actions. Enables chaining into elbow slam. Visual flourish for acrobatic moves.

member.name: F:BroBase.lastAirFlexJumpTime
member.summary: Timestamp of last air flex jump for cooldown enforcement. Prevents air flex spam with 0.1 second minimum interval. Ensures balanced aerial movement.

member.name: F:BroBase.lastTeleportFlexJumpTime
member.summary: Timestamp of last teleport flex use for 0.2 second cooldown. Prevents teleport ability spam. Works with FlexTeleport perk for tactical repositioning.

member.name: F:BroBase.maxCardioDuration
member.summary: Base maximum sprint duration before exhaustion triggers. Default 2.5 seconds, modified by ValueOrchestrator. Compared against cardioTime to determine when stamina depletes.

member.name: M:BroBase.AlertNearbyMooks
member.summary: Alerts nearby enemies with special pickpocket mechanic when dashing. If player has PickPocketMoney value, finds unalerted mooks within 8x8 range, fully alerts them, and triggers pickpocket perk event. Always alerts mooks normally afterward.

member.name: M:BroBase.ApplyPerformanceEnhancedFlexing
member.summary: Applies flexing animation when the bro is performance enhanced and idle. Virtual method allowing derived bros to customize their flexing behavior.

member.name: M:BroBase.BecomeExhausted
member.summary: Makes the bro exhausted from overexertion, preventing sprinting for 2.3 seconds. Stops any current dashing and resets cardio timer. Virtual method for subclass customization.

member.name: M:BroBase.BurstChest
member.summary: Handles chest burst effect with flex invulnerability protection. Only processes chest burst if not protected by flex invulnerability, preventing alien chest bursts during temporary invulnerability periods.

member.name: M:BroBase.CanFreeze
member.summary: Determines if this bro can be affected by freeze effects. Always returns true for BroBase characters, maintaining the base class behavior that heroes can be frozen.
member.returns: Always returns true.

member.name: M:BroBase.CanReduceLives
member.summary: Determines if death should consume a life. Returns false if marked for revival (preventing life loss), otherwise uses base logic. Critical for revival mechanics where death is temporary.
member.returns: False if will revive; otherwise, base implementation result.

member.name: M:BroBase.Damage(System.Int32,DamageType,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32,UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Processes incoming damage with revival and flex invulnerability checks. If marked for revival and damaged within 5 seconds of death, accelerates revival to 0.6 seconds. Ignores all damage during flex invulnerability. Always cancels elbow slam state when damaged.
member.param: Amount of damage to apply.
Type of damage being inflicted.
Horizontal knockback force.
Vertical knockback force.
Direction of the damage source.
The object that caused the damage.
X coordinate of the hit location.
Y coordinate of the hit location.

member.name: M:BroBase.Death(System.Single,System.Single,DamageObject)
member.summary: Handles character death with special effect cleanup. Sets posthumous fart delay (0.9s) for max flatulence level if not reviving. Destroys active flex effect GameObject. Delegates core death logic to base implementation.
member.param: Horizontal death force/velocity.
Vertical death force/velocity.
The damage object that caused death.

member.name: M:BroBase.DelayedRevive(System.Single)
member.summary: Configures delayed revival after death. Sets revival timer, prevents gibbing during revival window, marks for revival, and resets kill reporting. Integrates with holy water revival system for death recovery.
member.param: Time in seconds before revival occurs.

member.name: M:BroBase.HolyWaterRevive
member.summary: Revives a dead bro using holy water mechanics. Restores the bro to life with 1 health, applies temporary invulnerability, launches them upward, triggers time slowdown effects, and creates visual indicators.

member.name: M:BroBase.HolyWaterReviveRPC
member.summary: Network RPC handler for holy water revival. Processes revival commands from other players in multiplayer, only executing if the bro is currently dead.

member.name: M:BroBase.IsAlive
member.summary: Checks character alive status including revival state. Returns true if marked for revival with time remaining OR base alive check passes. Allows systems to treat reviving characters as semi-alive.
member.returns: True if reviving or health greater than 0; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.PerformanceEnhancedGrunt
member.summary: Creates area effects when grunting while performance enhanced. Every 4th grunt panics nearby units within 64 units, and in competitive modes also stuns them. Virtual method allowing subclass customization.

member.name: M:BroBase.SetActionstateToIdle
member.summary: Transitions the character to idle state with special handling for performance enhancement mode. Resets animation frame to 0 when performance enhanced and not performing other actions.

member.name: M:BroBase.SetGestureAnimation(GestureElement.Gestures)
member.summary: Complex gesture handler managing elbow slam, air flex, teleport flex, and visual effects. Triggers elbow slam when somersaulting+flex+down in air. Manages air flex with multiple validation checks. Creates flex visual effects and handles teleport initiation with time gates.
member.param: The gesture type to animate.

member.name: M:BroBase.TriggerFlexEvent
member.summary: Executes flex power effects based on player abilities. FlexAlluring attracts mooks within 96 units. FlexGoldenLight spawns 8-12 projectiles in arc pattern. FlexInvulnerability plays sound effect. Manages audio feedback for all flex powers.

member.name: P:BroBase.IsPerformanceEnhanced
member.summary: Gets whether the character is currently performance enhanced from steroids. Returns the value of the performanceEnhanced field which is set when using steroids for temporary ability boosts.
member.returns: True if performance enhanced; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:BroBase.WillReviveAlready
member.summary: Gets whether this bro will automatically revive after death. Set to true when holy water revival is triggered, checked during update to perform the actual revival.
member.returns: True if the bro has a pending revival; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:BroBase.cannotGibTime
member.summary: Temporary gibbing immunity duration to preserve body during revival. Set during DelayedRevive to prevent destruction. Ensures revival animations can play properly without body disappearing.

member.name: F:BroBase.exhaustedTime
member.summary: Duration of exhaustion state after sprint overexertion in seconds. Set to 2.3 when cardio limit exceeded. Prevents sprinting and continues sweat effects while active. Core component of stamina system.

member.name: F:BroBase.fartDelay
member.summary: Timer for posthumous flatulence effect. Set to 0.9 seconds on death with max flatulence. Creates comedic delayed explosion after death. Decrements until triggering fart.

member.name: F:BroBase.flexEffect
member.summary: Visual effect object for active flex powers. Created for golden light or invulnerability effects. Destroyed on state changes or death. Provides visual feedback for flex abilities.

member.name: F:BroBase.flexInvulnerability
member.summary: Duration timer for flex-induced invulnerability in seconds. Set to 0.25 during flex power activation. Prevents all damage while active. Strategic defensive window.

member.name: F:BroBase.flexSpecialFrame
member.summary: Animation frame counter for flex special moves. Increments during air flex, elbow slam, and recovery. Controls sprite progression for special animations. Separate from main frame counter.

member.name: F:BroBase.gettingUpFromElbowSlam
member.summary: Recovery state after elbow slam impact. Controls standup animation sequence. Prevents other actions during recovery. Ensures smooth transition from slam.

member.name: F:BroBase.isAirFlexing
member.summary: Active state for air flex special move. Controls animation state and physics during aerial flex. Cleared on landing or move completion. Part of flex combo system.

member.name: F:BroBase.isElbowSlamming
member.summary: Active state for downward elbow slam attack. Disables wall climbing and ladder interaction. Creates ground impact on landing. Aerial ground pound state.

member.name: F:BroBase.isFlatulent
member.summary: Flag indicating active flatulence ability from power-ups. Set when Flatulence modifier greater than 0. Enables fart jumps and death effects. Core comedy mechanic flag.

member.name: F:BroBase.performanceEnhanced
member.summary: Active state flag for performance enhancement from steroids. When true, enables special abilities like enhanced speed/jump, sweat particles, and area grunt effects. Controlled by performanceEnhancedTime duration.

member.name: F:BroBase.performanceEnhancedCounter
member.summary: Frame timer for performance enhancement visual and audio effects. Triggers sweat particles and grunt effects every 0.0667 seconds during enhancement or exhaustion. Manages effect frequency.

member.name: F:BroBase.performanceEnhancedTime
member.summary: Remaining duration of performance enhancement (steroid) effect in seconds. Set to 10 seconds by default or custom duration via UseSteroidsForDuration. Decrements each frame until reaching zero, then disables enhancement.

member.name: F:BroBase.performanceGrunCount
member.summary: Counter for performance enhancement grunt effects timing. Initialized to playerNum*4 when steroids activate. Every 4 grunts panics nearby units, every 16 plays flex sound. Creates escalating intimidation effects.

member.name: F:BroBase.reviveTime
member.summary: Delay in seconds before automatic revival triggers. Set by DelayedRevive method, can be extended by damage while dead. Compared against death time to initiate holy water revival sequence.

member.name: F:BroBase.willRevive
member.summary: Flag indicating pending automatic revival after death. Set by DelayedRevive or holy water mechanics. Prevents life loss and triggers revival when reviveTime expires. Essential for revival system.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateActualIdleDuckingFrames
member.summary: Handles ducking idle animation with elbow slam recovery override. Displays recovery animation when getting up from elbow slam, otherwise uses standard ducking idle frames.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateActualIdleFrames
member.summary: Manages idle animation with priority system for special states. Prioritizes elbow slam recovery and air flexing animations over standard idle when hasNewAirFlexFrames is true. Falls back to base idle animation otherwise.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateActualJumpingFrames
member.summary: Complex jumping animation controller managing multiple aerial states. Handles elbow slam (row 14), air flexing, front somersault (row 11, 12 frames), and recovery animations. Adjusts frame rates and gun visibility based on current action.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateAirFlexing
member.summary: Manages air flex animation sequence on sprite row 13. Creates flex effect during early frames, triggers air jump at frame 3, transitions to somersault at frame 4+. Variable frame timing for dramatic effect.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateFrozen
member.summary: Overrides frozen animation with empty implementation. BroBase characters do not display frozen animations, maintaining normal appearance even when frozen status is applied.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateGesture
member.summary: Animates gestures with special flex power effects. When flexing with appropriate powers, grants temporary invulnerability (0.25s) and creates golden light visual effects. Extends base gesture animation with gameplay benefits.

member.name: M:BroBase.AnimateGettingUpFromElbowSlam
member.summary: Handles 4-frame recovery animation from elbow slam on row 15. Fixed 0.07 frame rate, deactivates gun during animation, calls cleanup when complete to restore normal movement state.

member.name: M:BroBase.FrontSomersault
member.summary: Initiates front somersault animation state. Sets frontSomersaulting flag to trigger rolling animation in the animation system.

member.name: M:BroBase.IncreaseFrame
member.summary: Advances animation frames with special counter for flex animations. Increments flexSpecialFrame when performing air flex, elbow slam, or recovery animations, maintaining separate timing for special moves.

member.name: F:BroBase.hasNewAirFlexFrames
member.summary: Indicates availability of enhanced animation frames for flex moves. Controls which sprite sequences are used. Affects elbow slam, air flex, and recovery animations. Animation quality flag.

member.name: M:BroBase.CheckInput
member.summary: Processes gesture button input for teleport cancellation. Destroys remote teleport projectile when gesture button is pressed, allowing players to cancel teleport targeting.

member.name: M:BroBase.CheckWhetherShouldClearInput
member.summary: Manages input restrictions during special animation states. Clears specific inputs during elbow slam (fire/highfive/special), recovery (movement unless other input detected), and air flexing (all except down when jumping).

member.name: M:BroBase.DestroyRemoteProjectile
member.summary: Cleans up remote projectile with cooldown update. Calls base destruction logic and sets teleport cooldown timer to manage ability frequency.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayBackflipGruntSound
member.summary: Plays a specific grunt sound for backflip maneuvers. Uses voice pack backflip grunt clips at a fixed volume of 0.12. Called during chimney flips and other acrobatic moves.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayChimneyFlipSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays sound during chimney flip/wall jump maneuvers. Combines a backflip grunt sound with the base dash sound effect for the complete audio experience.
member.param: Volume level for the dash sound component.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayClimbSound
member.summary: Plays climbing sound with voice pack support and frequency-based volume reduction. Reduces volume to 66% if another climb sound was played within 1.5 seconds. Uses random volume variation (0.23-0.28) for variety.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayDeathSound
member.summary: Plays death sound when the bro dies. Uses voice pack death clips if available at 0.3 volume, otherwise falls back to standard hit sounds. Provides character-specific death audio.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayExitLadderSound
member.summary: Plays sound when exiting a ladder. Simply delegates to the jump sound system to provide appropriate footstep audio.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayFlexSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays flexing sound during flex gestures. Cycles through an array of flex sounds using a static index to provide variety. Each bro can have multiple unique flex sounds that play in sequence.
member.param: Volume level for the flex sound.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayJetpackSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays jetpack sound effect. Initializes and manages the jetpack sound instance for continuous jetpack audio during flight.
member.param: Volume level for the jetpack sound.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayJumpSound
member.summary: Plays jump sound with voice pack support and frequency-based volume reduction. Reduces volume to 66% if another jump sound was played within 2.5 seconds to prevent audio spam. Always plays footstep sounds in addition to voice.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayPushBlockSound
member.summary: Plays grunt sound when pushing blocks with voice pack support. Reduces volume by 40% if called within 1.7 seconds of the last push sound to prevent audio spam during continuous pushing.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayRollLandSound
member.summary: Plays a landing grunt sound when the bro lands from a roll. Uses voice pack fall grunt clips with a 2-second cooldown to prevent spam. Volume varies randomly between 0.1-0.12.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayThrowHeavySound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays the heavy throwing sound (typically for throwing mooks) with voice pack support. Uses unique bro voice if available and not bypassed, otherwise plays standard throw sound.
member.param: Volume multiplier for the sound playback.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayThrowLightSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays the light throwing sound (typically for grenades) with voice pack support. Uses unique bro voice if available and not bypassed, otherwise plays standard throw sound.
member.param: Volume multiplier for the sound playback.

member.name: M:BroBase.PlayYeahSound(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays celebration/victory sound with voice pack support. Uses character-specific "yeah" clips if available, otherwise falls back to standard power-up sounds.
member.param: Base volume level for the sound.
Pitch modification for the sound.
Whether to bypass reverb effects.

member.name: P:BroBase.BypassNewVoices
member.summary: Gets whether new voice lines should be bypassed for this bro. Combines a static class-wide bypass flag with an instance-specific bypass flag.
member.returns: True if voices should be bypassed globally or for this specific bro; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:BroBase.SoundHolderVoice
member.summary: Gets the voice sound holder for this bro, providing access to unique character voice lines. Virtual property allowing derived bros to provide different voice packs.
member.returns: The SoundHolderVoice instance for this bro.

member.name: F:BroBase.byPassNewVoices
member.summary: Global static flag to disable voice pack system for all bros. When true, forces all BroBase instances to use standard sound effects instead of character-specific voice packs. Combines with instance field in BypassNewVoices property.

member.name: F:BroBase.bypassNewVoicesOnThisBro
member.summary: Instance-specific flag to disable voice pack for individual bro. Public field allowing per-character voice configuration. Combines with static byPassNewVoices in BypassNewVoices property for flexible audio control.

member.name: F:BroBase.flexSoundIndex
member.summary: Shared static counter for cycling through flex sound variations. Incremented each time any bro plays flex sound, used with modulo to select from flex sound array. Ensures audio variety across all characters.

member.name: F:BroBase.lastClimbSoundTime
member.summary: Tracks timestamp of last climbing sound for frequency-based volume control. Reduces climb sound volume to 66% if played within 1.5 seconds of previous climb sound, preventing audio fatigue during continuous climbing.

member.name: F:BroBase.lastJumpSoundTime
member.summary: Tracks timestamp of last jump sound playback for volume management. Used to reduce volume to 66% if jumps occur within 2.5 seconds, preventing audio spam while maintaining variety in repeated jump vocalizations.

member.name: F:BroBase.lastLandSoundTime
member.summary: Tracks timestamp of last roll landing sound to prevent audio spam. Prevents landing sounds from playing if less than 2 seconds have passed since last landing, managing fall grunt frequency.

member.name: F:BroBase.lastPushSoundTime
member.summary: Tracks timestamp of last block pushing sound for volume management. Reduces push grunt volume by 40% if played within 1.7 seconds, preventing repetitive audio during continuous block pushing.

member.name: F:BroBase.soundHolderVoice
member.summary: Stores reference to the voice sound collection component containing character-specific voice clips. Used throughout audio methods for jump grunts, climb sounds, death sounds, and other vocalizations. Accessed via SoundHolderVoice property.

member.name: M:BroBase.IsOverLadder(System.Single@)
member.summary: Checks if the bro is positioned over a ladder for climbing. Prevents ladder interaction during elbow slam state to maintain downward attack momentum.
member.param: Output parameter for the ladder's X position if found.
member.returns: True if over a ladder and not elbow slamming; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.IsOverLadder(System.Single,System.Single@)
member.summary: Checks if the bro is over a ladder with horizontal offset consideration. Prevents ladder grabbing during elbow slam attacks to ensure attack completion.
member.param: Horizontal offset from bro position to check.
Output parameter for the ladder's X position if found.
member.returns: True if over a ladder at offset and not elbow slamming; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:BroBase.ReachedCheckPoint
member.summary: Called when the bro reaches a checkpoint. Performs base checkpoint behavior and attempts to spawn a companion drone.

member.name: M:BroBase.SpawnDrone
member.summary: Spawns a networked drone companion at the player's position. Creates drone 3 units above player, stores reference in currentDrone field for tracking. Virtual method allowing custom drone types in derived bros.

member.name: M:BroBase.TrySpawnDrone
member.summary: Attempts to spawn a companion drone for the bro. Only spawns if no current drone exists. Sets tracking flag after spawning.

member.name: F:BroBase.currentDrone
member.summary: Reference to active drone companion. Spawned when player has Drones modifier. Checked for null/alive status before spawning new drone. Persistent AI companion.

member.name: F:BroBase.droneCounter
member.summary: Unused timer initialized to 1.0 for drone system. Currently has no active functionality. Placeholder for potential future drone mechanics.

member.name: F:BroBase.hasHadDrone
member.summary: Tracks if drone has been spawned this session. Triggers initial drone spawn attempt when false. Set true after first successful spawn. One-time spawn flag.

member.name: M:BroBase.AirFlexJump
member.summary: Executes flex-powered air jump with dynamic velocity scaling. Time-gated at 0.1s intervals, calculates jump boost between 0.5x-1.8x based on current velocity. Creates land effect and consumes flex jump charge.

member.name: M:BroBase.CreateJetpackFlames(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates vertical jetpack flame particles for upward thrust visualization. Generates dual plume effects positioned at 2.5 units horizontally, with -70 downward velocity creating realistic exhaust. Particles last 0.4 seconds with 1.3x fade rate.
member.param: Direction vector for jetpack thrust orientation.

member.name: M:BroBase.CreateJetpackFlamesDash(UnityEngine.Vector3@)
member.summary: Creates continuous flame trail during jetpack dash movements. Calculates path between positions, generates particles at 2 unit intervals up to 50 units maximum. Updates reference position for smooth trail continuity across frames.
member.param: Reference to last flame position for trail calculation.

member.name: M:BroBase.CreateJetpackFlamesHorizontal(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Creates horizontal jetpack flame particles for lateral movement. Similar to vertical flames but with -10 downward velocity for wider spread pattern. Provides visual feedback for horizontal jetpack maneuvers.
member.param: Direction vector for jetpack thrust orientation.

member.name: M:BroBase.CreateSweatParticle
member.summary: Creates visual sweat particle effects near the bro. Generates water drip particles with random position offset within a unit circle, adjusted for ducking state. Particles inherit some of the bro's velocity for realistic movement.

member.name: M:BroBase.MustSync
member.summary: Indicates whether this character requires network synchronization. Virtual method always returning true for BroBase, ensuring all player characters are synchronized in multiplayer.
member.returns: Always returns true.

member.name: M:BroBase.SetupThrownMookVelocity(System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Configures the throwing velocity for captured mooks. Uses stronger throw velocity (360 horizontal, 120 vertical) when performance enhanced, otherwise uses standard velocity (210 horizontal, 120 vertical). Adds portion of current velocity to throw.
member.param: Output horizontal velocity for the thrown mook.
Output vertical velocity for the thrown mook.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartElbowSlam
member.summary: Initiates elbow slam attack sequence with physics modifications. Disables wall climbing, sets animation timing (0.066f), adjusts downward velocity (minimum 210), and plays flex sound. Prepares for ground pound attack.

member.name: M:BroBase.StartTeleportFlexing
member.summary: Initiates teleport targeting with 0.2s cooldown check. Spawns RemoteTeleportTarget projectile for position marking if no existing projectile and cooldown expired. Activates bro and manages projectile reference.

member.name: M:BroBase.TryCreateFlexEffect
member.summary: Creates visual effects for flex powers when not already active. Spawns golden light effect for FlexGoldenLight power or invulnerability effect for FlexInvulnerability power. Prevents duplicate effects by checking flexEffect null state.

member.name: F:BroBase.jetPackActive
member.summary: Active state flag for jetpack thrust effect. When true, provides upward velocity and creates flame particles. Controlled by jetPackTime duration and manages thrust physics.

member.name: F:BroBase.jetPackAvailable
member.summary: One-time use flag for jetpack power-up availability. Set false when consumed via UseJetpack. Reset on landing. Gates access to jetpack ability.

member.name: F:BroBase.jetPackFlameCounter
member.summary: Timer for jetpack flame particle spawning. Triggers effects every 0.0225 seconds. Active during jetpack use and JetpackPunch attacks. Visual effect timing control.

member.name: F:BroBase.jetPackSprite
member.summary: Visual sprite component for jetpack equipment display. Activated when jetpack is used, deactivated when jetPackTime expires. Provides visual feedback for jetpack power-up state.

member.name: F:BroBase.jetPackTime
member.summary: Active jetpack thrust duration timer. Set to 0.66 seconds on activation. Different thrust levels: extra boost above 0.36s, normal boost above 0.16s. Controls jetpack physics phases.

member.name: F:BroBase.bros
member.summary: Static registry of all active BroBase instances in the game. Automatically managed through Awake/OnDestroy lifecycle. Used by Map.GetNearestHero and other systems for hero detection, targeting, and proximity checks. Essential for multiplayer hero tracking and AI target acquisition.

member.name: M:BroforceObject.SetPosition(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Sets the object's world position to the specified coordinates while preserving the current Z position. Updates the internal X and Y fields to match the new transform position.
member.param: The new position vector (only X and Y components are used, Z is preserved from current transform)

member.name: M:BroforceObject.SetSpeed(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Virtual method for setting the object's velocity. Base implementation is empty - derived classes should override to implement velocity changes.
member.param: The horizontal velocity component
The vertical velocity component

member.name: M:BroforceObject.SetXY(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Updates the internal X and Y coordinate fields directly without modifying the transform position. This method only updates the backing fields for the X and Y properties.
member.param: The new X coordinate value to store
The new Y coordinate value to store

member.name: M:BroforceObject.SetXY(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Convenience method that extracts the X and Y position from a transform and calls SetXY(float, float) to update the internal coordinate fields.
member.param: The transform whose position will be used to set the X and Y coordinates

member.name: P:BroforceObject.X
member.summary: Gets or sets the object's X position coordinate. This property provides access to the private x field which stores the horizontal position.

member.name: P:BroforceObject.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets the object's Y position coordinate. This property provides access to the private y field which stores the vertical position.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.x
member.summary: Private backing field that stores the object's X coordinate position. Serialized for persistence and accessed through the X property.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.xI
member.summary: The object's horizontal velocity component. Used for physics calculations and movement updates in derived classes.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.y
member.summary: Private backing field that stores the object's Y coordinate position. Serialized for persistence and accessed through the Y property.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.yI
member.summary: The object's vertical velocity component. Used for physics calculations and movement updates in derived classes.

member.name: M:BroforceObject.AttachMe(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Attaches another GameObject to this object by adding it to the otherAttachments list. Used by the attachment system to track objects that are connected to this one.
member.param: The transform of the GameObject to attach

member.name: M:BroforceObject.CrumbleBridge(System.Single)
member.summary: Virtual method that triggers a bridge crumbling event. The base implementation only invokes the OnCrumbleBridge event if handlers are subscribed. Derived classes can override to add specific crumbling behavior.
member.param: The probability or intensity of the crumbling effect (unused in base implementation)

member.name: M:BroforceObject.Disturb
member.summary: Triggers a disturbance event on this object. If the object has a chain anchor, it collapses the chain. Then invokes the OnDisturb event if any handlers are subscribed. Can be called via RPC for network synchronization.

member.name: M:BroforceObject.HideOtherAttachments
member.summary: Hides all attached objects by sending them a "Collapse" message and deactivating their GameObjects. Iterates through the otherAttachments list and processes each non-null attachment.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.chainAnchor
member.summary: Reference to a ChainAnchor component that can connect this object to chains or ropes. When the object is disturbed, the chain anchor will collapse if present.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.collapsed
member.summary: Flag indicating whether this object has collapsed or fallen. Used by environmental systems to track the state of destructible or physics-enabled objects.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.otherAttachments
member.summary: List of GameObjects that are attached to this object. Used by the attachment system to track and manage connected objects. Initialized as an empty list.

member.name: M:BroforceObject.ForgetPlayer(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Virtual method called when a player should be forgotten by this object. Base implementation is empty - derived classes override to implement AI behavior changes when players die or disconnect.
member.param: The player number (0-3) that should be forgotten
If true, mooks should become confused instead of simply forgetting the player
If true, mooks should laugh at the dead player instead of forgetting them

member.name: M:BroforceObject.GetHealthPercentage
member.summary: Calculates the object's health as a percentage of its maximum health. Returns a value between 0 and 1, clamped to prevent invalid percentages.
member.returns: The health percentage as a float between 0.0 (dead) and 1.0 (full health)

member.name: M:BroforceObject.IsAlive
member.summary: Checks if the object is still alive based on its health value. Returns true if health is greater than 0, false otherwise.
member.returns: True if the object has health remaining (health > 0), false if dead or destroyed

member.name: F:BroforceObject.destroyed
member.summary: Flag indicating whether this object has been destroyed. Used to prevent multiple destruction calls and to track object lifecycle state.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.health
member.summary: The object's current health points. Defaults to 3. When health reaches 0 or below, the object is considered dead as determined by IsAlive().

member.name: F:BroforceObject.maxHealth
member.summary: The object's maximum health capacity used for calculating health percentage. Defaults to -1, which should be set by derived classes to an appropriate value.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.protectedFromDestruction
member.summary: When true, prevents this object from being destroyed by normal damage or destruction calls. Used for invincible objects or during special game states.

member.name: F:BroforceObject.predabroTarget
member.summary: Reference to a PredabroTarget component used by the Predabro enemy type for targeting logic. Hidden in inspector as it's managed programmatically.

member.name: M:CameraController.Awake
member.summary: Unity Awake lifecycle method that initializes the singleton instance and configures post-processing effects based on quality settings. Sets up the global instance reference and disables performance-intensive effects (displacement and distortion) when ScreenPostFXLevel is less than 1.

member.name: M:CameraController.Update
member.summary: Unity Update lifecycle method that maintains camera synchronization. Ensures all cameras maintain matching aspect ratios and orthographic sizes with the main camera. The sky camera receives special handling, with its size interpolated based on the SamRaimiEffectM value to create dynamic atmospheric effects.

member.name: P:CameraController.MainCam
member.summary: Gets the main camera used for rendering. This property provides static access to either the instance's mainCamera if available, or falls back to Camera.main with frame-based caching for performance optimization. The caching mechanism prevents repeated Camera.main lookups within the same frame.

member.name: F:CameraController.backgroundCamera
member.summary: Camera dedicated to rendering background elements. Part of the multi-camera layered rendering system that allows separate control over background visuals.

member.name: F:CameraController.displacementCamera
member.summary: Camera used for displacement mapping effects. Works in conjunction with displacementScript to create visual distortion effects. Disabled when ScreenPostFXLevel is less than 1.

member.name: F:CameraController.distortionCamera
member.summary: Camera for rendering distortion effects. Part of the post-processing pipeline and is disabled when ScreenPostFXLevel is less than 1 to improve performance on lower-end systems.

member.name: F:CameraController.effectsamera
member.summary: Camera dedicated to rendering special effects. Note the typo in the field name (effectsamera instead of effectsCamera) is preserved from the original code.

member.name: F:CameraController.foliageCamera
member.summary: Camera responsible for rendering foliage and plant elements. This separate camera allows for specialized rendering of vegetation with different settings or effects.

member.name: F:CameraController.groundCamera
member.summary: Camera for rendering ground and terrain elements. Part of the layered rendering system that separates terrain from other visual elements.

member.name: F:CameraController.instance
member.summary: Singleton instance of the CameraController. Set during Awake() to provide global access to the camera management system. This allows other systems to access camera functionality without needing direct references.

member.name: F:CameraController.lightingCamera
member.summary: Camera used for rendering lighting effects. This dedicated camera enables special lighting passes and effects to be composited into the final image.

member.name: F:CameraController.mainCamera
member.summary: Reference to the main rendering camera. This is the primary camera that renders the main game view and serves as the reference for synchronizing orthographic sizes across all other cameras in the system.

member.name: F:CameraController.skyCamera
member.summary: Camera for rendering sky and atmospheric elements. Its orthographic size is specially adjusted based on the SamRaimiEffectM value to create dynamic sky effects.

member.name: F:CameraController.uiCamera
member.summary: Camera dedicated to rendering UI elements. This separation ensures UI renders on top of game elements and isn't affected by game camera effects.

member.name: F:CameraController.uiGameplayCamera
member.summary: Camera for rendering gameplay-related UI elements. Separate from the main UI camera to allow different rendering settings for in-game UI versus menu UI.

member.name: F:CameraController.waterCamera
member.summary: Camera specifically for rendering water effects and surfaces. Allows specialized water rendering techniques to be applied separately from other elements.

member.name: P:CameraController.DefaultHalfWidth
member.summary: Gets the default half-width value used for calculating the default orthographic size. This constant value (227f) represents half the horizontal view width in world units.

member.name: P:CameraController.DefaultOrthographicSize
member.summary: Gets the default orthographic size calculated from the default half-width and current screen aspect ratio. This provides a consistent base size regardless of screen resolution.

member.name: P:CameraController.OrthographicSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the orthographic size for all cameras in the system. When set, synchronizes the orthographic size across all 11 cameras (with special handling for skyCamera based on SamRaimiEffectM). This ensures all visual layers maintain consistent scale.

member.name: P:CameraController.SamRaimiEffectM
member.summary: Gets or sets the interpolation factor for the "Sam Raimi effect" (named after the filmmaker known for dynamic camera work). This value (0-1) controls special sky camera behavior, with the sky camera's orthographic size interpolating between 128f and the main camera's size based on this factor.

member.name: P:CameraController.ScreenPostFXLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets the post-processing effects quality level. This value is stored in PlayerOptions and determines which visual effects are enabled. Values less than 1 disable displacement and distortion effects for performance.

member.name: F:CameraController.displacementScript
member.summary: Reference to the DisplacementCamera component that handles displacement mapping effects. This script is disabled when ScreenPostFXLevel is less than 1 during initialization for performance optimization.

member.name: F:CameraController.imageDistortionScript
member.summary: Reference to the ImageRefractionEffect component that creates image distortion/refraction effects. Disabled when ScreenPostFXLevel is less than 1 to improve performance on lower-end systems.

member.name: F:CameraController.samRaimiEffectM
member.summary: Private static backing field for the SamRaimiEffectM property. Stores the interpolation value (0-1) used to create dynamic sky camera effects inspired by Sam Raimi's cinematography style.

member.name: M:CameraController.GetCamerasForGIF
member.summary: Creates a list containing only the background camera for GIF capture purposes. This method is used by the GIF recording system to capture simplified footage, focusing only on the background layer rather than the full multi-camera composite.
member.returns: A new List containing only the backgroundCamera reference.

member.name: F:CameraController.CurCameraMain
member.summary: Cached reference to Camera.main used by the MainCam property. This caching mechanism works with cachedFrame to avoid the performance cost of repeatedly accessing Camera.main within a single frame, only updating when the frame count changes.

member.name: F:CameraController.cachedFrame
member.summary: Stores the frame number when Camera.main was last cached. Used in the MainCam property getter to optimize performance by preventing repeated Camera.main lookups within the same frame. Initialized to -1 to ensure the first access triggers a cache update.

member.name: M:CheckPoint.Awake
member.summary: Registers this checkpoint with the Map system and initializes position coordinates. Called when the checkpoint GameObject is first created.

member.name: M:CheckPoint.OnDestroy
member.summary: Removes the steel replacement flag from ground blocks below and adjacent to the checkpoint position. This reverses the ground reinforcement applied during setup, using raycasts to find the affected blocks.

member.name: M:CheckPoint.Start
member.summary: Hides the flag GameObject initially and disables the flag renderer for invisible checkpoints. Called after Awake on the first frame when the checkpoint becomes active.

member.name: M:CheckPoint.Update
member.summary: Handles one-time setup when not in edit mode, reinforces nearby ground blocks, detects blocking units, and manages the deactivation delay timer. For non-invisible checkpoints, this method raycast-checks blocks directly below the checkpoint and its adjacent positions, marking them to be replaced with steel blocks if they collapse (excluding cage and sandbag blocks).

member.name: F:CheckPoint.isSetup
member.summary: Tracks whether the one-time setup in Update() has been completed. Prevents repeated setup operations and ground reinforcement checks after initial configuration.

member.name: M:CheckPoint.ActivateInternal
member.summary: Activates the checkpoint, raising the flag, playing sound effects, setting it as the current spawn point, and triggering end-level sequences for final checkpoints. Notifies statistics controller of checkpoint capture and handles special behavior for Hell theme levels (portal) vs normal levels (helicopter).

member.name: M:CheckPoint.DelayDeactivate(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets a timer to automatically deactivate the checkpoint after the specified delay. Used for temporary checkpoint states or special game modes.
member.param: Time in seconds before the checkpoint deactivates

member.name: M:CheckPoint.IsBlockedByUnit
member.summary: Checks if an evil unit is preventing checkpoint activation by being alive and within 96 units distance. Final checkpoints detect blocking units during setup to determine end-level trigger behavior.
member.returns: True if a living evil unit is within blocking range, false otherwise

member.name: M:CheckPoint.ReactivateInternal
member.summary: Sets this checkpoint as the current spawn point without triggering activation effects. Used to restore checkpoint state when loading saved games or synchronizing multiplayer state.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.activated
member.summary: Current activation state of the checkpoint. When true, the flag is raised and this serves as a valid spawn point. Synchronized across network for multiplayer games.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.blockingUnit
member.summary: Reference to the nearest evil unit found during setup. Used to determine if checkpoint activation should be blocked and whether this is a final checkpoint that triggers level completion.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.deactivateDelay
member.summary: Countdown timer in seconds for automatic deactivation. When greater than zero, decrements each frame and deactivates the checkpoint when reaching zero.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.flag
member.summary: Reference to the FlagFlap component that handles the visual flag raising animation. The flag GameObject is initially inactive and shown when the checkpoint activates.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.isFinal
member.summary: Marks this as the level's final checkpoint. When activated, triggers level completion sequence (helicopter extraction or hell portal depending on theme). Set during setup if evil units are nearby.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.airDropCheckPoint
member.summary: Determines if players respawn via airdrop parachute animation when spawning at this checkpoint. Map system checks this flag when determining spawn method for revived players.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.airDropExtraHeight
member.summary: Additional height offset in units added to airdrop spawn position when airDropCheckPoint is true. Default value of 128 units provides clearance for parachute deployment animation.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.checkPointID
member.summary: Unique identifier assigned by Map.RegisterCheckPoint() based on registration order. Used to track which checkpoint is currently active and for save/load functionality. Default value of -1 indicates unregistered.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.invisibleCheckPoint
member.summary: When true, all renderers are disabled making the checkpoint completely invisible to players. Invisible checkpoints skip ground reinforcement and blocking unit detection during setup.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.flagRaiseAudioClip
member.summary: Custom audio clip played when the checkpoint activates and raises its flag. If null, no additional sound is played beyond the standard spatial sound component.

member.name: F:CheckPoint.yeahVolume
member.summary: Volume level for celebration sound effects. Default 0.5f provides balanced audio. Currently unused in the implementation but available for modders to implement custom sounds.

member.name: M:CheckPoint.PackState(UnityStream)
member.summary: Serializes the checkpoint's activation state for network synchronization. Only the activated boolean is transmitted to keep bandwidth usage minimal.
member.param: Stream to write the serialized state data
member.returns: The stream after serialization for method chaining

member.name: M:CheckPoint.UnpackState(UnityStream)
member.summary: Deserializes checkpoint state from network data, restoring activation status and triggering visual updates. For activated final checkpoints, also restores the helicopter/portal state.
member.param: Stream containing the serialized state data
member.returns: The stream after deserialization for method chaining

member.name: M:CutsceneController.Awake
member.summary: Initializes the CutsceneController singleton instance and subscribes to scene change events

member.name: M:CutsceneController.OnDestroy
member.summary: Cleans up the singleton instance and unsubscribes from scene change events

member.name: F:CutsceneController.letterBoxCamera
member.summary: Camera used for letterbox effect during cutscenes

member.name: M:CutsceneController.CloseAllCutscenes
member.summary: Ends all active cutscenes including both bro and boss intro roots
