member.summary: Destroys this unit's game object, removing it from the game. Can be overridden to implement custom destruction behavior or cleanup.

member.name: M:Unit.DischargePilotingUnit(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ejects the pilot from this unit at the specified position and velocity. Base implementation is empty. Override in pilotable units to implement pilot ejection mechanics.
member.param: The X position where the pilot should be ejected.
The Y position where the pilot should be ejected.
The horizontal velocity to apply to the ejected pilot.
The vertical velocity to apply to the ejected pilot.
Whether to stun the pilot upon ejection.

member.name: M:Unit.GetFuel
member.summary: Returns the current fuel level of the unit. Base implementation returns 0. Override in fuel-consuming units like vehicles or jetpack units to return actual fuel amount.
member.returns: The current fuel level as a float value.

member.name: M:Unit.GetFuelWarning
member.summary: Checks whether the unit's fuel is low enough to display a warning. Base implementation returns false. Override in fuel-consuming units to implement low fuel detection.
member.returns: True if fuel is critically low, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Unit.GetMookType
member.summary: Returns the type of mook (enemy) this unit represents. Base implementation returns MookType.None. Override in enemy units to return specific mook type.
member.returns: The MookType enum value for this unit.

member.name: M:Unit.GetPilottedUnit
member.summary: Returns the unit currently being piloted by this unit. Base implementation returns null. Override in pilot-capable units to return the actual piloted unit reference.
member.returns: The piloted unit, or null if not piloting anything.

member.name: M:Unit.IsDecapitated
member.summary: Checks whether the unit has been decapitated (head removed). Base implementation returns false. Override in units that can be decapitated to track headless state.
member.returns: True if decapitated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Unit.IsEvil
member.summary: Determines whether this unit is an evil/enemy character. Base implementation returns false. Override in enemy units to return true.
member.returns: True if the unit is evil, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Unit.IsHeavy
member.summary: Determines whether this unit is too heavy for certain interactions like throwing. Base implementation returns false. Override in heavy units to return true.
member.returns: True if the unit is heavy, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Unit.OpenParachute
member.summary: Opens the unit's parachute for controlled descent. Base implementation is empty. Override in derived classes to implement parachute deployment.

member.name: M:Unit.PilotUnit(Unit)
member.summary: Initiates the piloting of this unit by another unit. Only processes if the piloting unit belongs to the local player and sends RPC to synchronize the piloting state across all players.
member.param: The unit that will pilot this unit.

member.name: M:Unit.PilotUnitRPC(Unit)
member.summary: Remote procedure call handler for synchronizing pilot unit changes across the network. Base implementation is empty. Override in pilotable units to handle the pilot assignment.
member.param: The new pilot unit to assign.

member.name: M:Unit.Revive(System.Int32,System.Boolean,TestVanDammeAnim)
member.summary: Attempts to revive this unit from death or incapacitation. Base implementation returns false. Override in revivable units to implement revival mechanics.
member.param: The player number who will control the revived unit.
Whether the revived unit will be under player control.
The unit performing the revival.
member.returns: True if revival was successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Unit.ReviveRPC(System.Int32,System.Boolean,TestVanDammeAnim)
member.summary: Remote procedure call for synchronizing unit revival across the network. Calls the local Revive method with the provided parameters.
member.param: The player number who will control the revived unit.
Whether the revived unit will be under player control.
The unit performing the revival.

member.name: M:Unit.SetCanParachute
member.summary: Enables the unit's ability to use a parachute. Calls SetCanParachute(true) internally.

member.name: M:Unit.SetCanParachute(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets whether the unit can use a parachute. Base implementation is empty. Override in derived classes to implement parachute capability toggling.
member.param: True to enable parachute capability, false to disable.

member.name: M:Unit.SetFriendlyExplosion
member.summary: Marks explosions created by this unit as friendly, preventing them from damaging allies. Base implementation is empty. Override to implement friendly fire prevention.

member.name: M:Unit.SetImmuneToOutOfBounds
member.summary: Makes the unit immune to out-of-bounds death. Base implementation is empty. Override to implement immunity to boundary-based destruction.

member.name: M:Unit.StartPilotingUnit(Unit)
member.summary: Called when this unit begins piloting another unit. Base implementation is empty. Override in units that can pilot to implement pilot initialization logic.

member.name: M:Unit.TryConnectHighFive
member.summary: Attempts to connect a high-five with another unit. Base implementation always returns false. Override in player units to enable high-five connections.
member.returns: True if high-five was successful, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Unit.WhereDidIDie
member.summary: Returns the position where this unit died. Base implementation returns the current transform position. Override to return a stored death location if needed.
member.returns: The 3D position where the unit died.

member.name: P:Unit.IsNotReplicantHero
member.summary: Gets whether this unit is not a replicated hero from another player. Returns true if the unit belongs to the local player or if it's not a hero unit. Used for network replication logic.

member.name: F:Unit.beingControlledByTriggerAction

member.name: F:Unit.controllingTriggerAction
